originContent: - go to `about:debugging#/runtime/this-firefox` in your browser
translatedContent: - go to `about:debugging#/runtime/this-firefox` in your browser

originContent: - click the settings button and go to `Debug addons`.
translatedContent: - click the settings button and go to `Debug addons`.

originContent: - click `Load Temporary Add-On`
translatedContent: - click `Load Temporary Add-On`

originContent: - select the `/tmp/rosettastonks.xpi` file in the file picker.
translatedContent: - select the `/tmp/rosettastonks.xpi` file in the file picker.

originContent: _Warning: This method only installs the extension temporarily, meaning that if
translatedContent: _Warning: This method only installs the extension temporarily, meaning that if

originContent: you close your browser, the addon will be uninstalled. This is due to firefox
translatedContent: you close your browser, the addon will be uninstalled. This is due to firefox

originContent: policies not allowing unverified extensions to be used._
translatedContent: policies not allowing unverified extensions to be used._

originContent: ## How to use
translatedContent: ## How to use

originContent: ### Adding time
translatedContent: ### Adding time

originContent: #### Adding time in Foundations
translatedContent: #### Adding time in Foundations

originContent: To add time on `foundations` product, you need to go to your exercises, and
translatedContent: To add time on the `foundations` product, you need to go to your exercises, and

originContent: click ignore or resolve one question at least. Once this is done, a time field
translatedContent: click ignore or resolve at least one question. Once this is done, a time field

originContent: should appear on the extension page on which you can add your time.
translatedContent: should appear on the extension page where you can add your time.

originContent: #### Adding time in Fluency builder
translatedContent: #### Adding time in Fluency builder

originContent: To add time on `fluency builder` product, you need to go to your exercises, and
translatedContent: To add time on the `fluency builder` product, you need to go to your exercises, and

originContent: answer at least one exercise. If the add time field does not appear, it means
translatedContent: answer at least one exercise. If the add time field does not appear, it means

originContent: that no time request was caught, you need to refresh the question and answer it
translatedContent: that no time request was caught; you need to refresh the question and answer it

originContent: once again. To have the time added, you need to finish the lesson you used to
translatedContent: again. To have the time added, you need to finish the lesson where you used to

originContent: add time.
translatedContent: add time.

originContent: _Note: If you don't see the add time field, it means that the actions you took
translatedContent: _Note: If you don't see the add time field, it means that the actions you took

originContent: on Rosetta stone website did not lead to adding legitimate time, and therefore,
translatedContent: on the Rosetta Stone website did not lead to adding legitimate time, and therefore,

originContent: you need to answer other questions._
translatedContent: you need to answer other questions._

translatedContent: #### Validating lesson in Foundations

originContent: To validate a lesson, one needs to start a lesson, and go through all of the
translatedContent: To validate a lesson, you need to start a lesson and go through all of the

originContent: questions through the `ignore` button on the bottom right. Once all the
translatedContent: questions using the `ignore` button on the bottom right. Once all the

originContent: questions have been seen, clicking the `validate lesson` button should validate
translatedContent: questions have been seen, clicking the `validate lesson` button should validate

originContent: the lesson. If not, go back to your home page, click on the same lesson, it
translatedContent: the lesson. If not, go back to your home page, click on the same lesson, it

originContent: Which will produce `rosettastonks.xpi`, the file for the extension that can be
translatedContent: This will produce `rosettastonks.xpi`, the file for the extension that can be
